entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather and he has taken over his parents' house. He mentions that it was his parents' house and that he offered it to Dumbledore for headquarters.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Sirius's godson and he is visiting Sirius at his house.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and Sirius has offered him his parents' house as headquarters.

entities.name: the phoenix
entities.description: The Phoenix is a book that Harry is reading.

relationships.description: Sirius has offered his parents' house to Dumbledore as headquarters.
